body:
Cirrus CI showed the error below when checking PR https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22541
The PR does not change `netaddress.cpp`.

The link to the CI result is https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5715337967566848 .

```
netaddress.cpp:1190:18: runtime error: implicit conversion from type 'int' of value -1 (32-bit, signed) to type 'uint8_t' (aka 'unsigned char') changed the value to 255 (8-bit, unsigned)
    #0 0x55d468c93e55  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x3caae55)
    #1 0x55d467ccdf56  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x2ce4f56)
    #2 0x55d467ccd529  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x2ce4529)
    #3 0x55d467d66138  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x2d7d138)
    #4 0x55d467d635b4  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x2d7a5b4)
    #5 0x55d467839a7f  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x2850a7f)
    #6 0x55d46778fb77  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x27a6b77)
    #7 0x55d4690a0067  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x40b7067)
    #8 0x55d46909fd15  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x40b6d15)
    #9 0x55d467695511  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x26ac511)
    #10 0x55d467694c55  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x26abc55)
    #11 0x55d467697577  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x26ae577)
    #12 0x55d4676978d9  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x26ae8d9)
    #13 0x55d4676865ae  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x269d5ae)
    #14 0x55d4676af3f2  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x26c63f2)
    #15 0x7f2cc72800b2  (/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6+0x270b2)
    #16 0x55d46765b34d  (/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz+0x267234d)

SUMMARY: UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer: implicit-signed-integer-truncation netaddress.cpp:1190:18 in 
MS: 0 ; base unit: 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
artifact_prefix='./'; Test unit written to ./crash-0671aac15e619e99522e2119487eaa9cc97e5a34

Target "/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/src/test/fuzz/fuzz -runs=1 /tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/qa-assets/fuzz_seed_corpus/banman" failed with exit code 1
```
title: Cirrus CI showed error in netaddress.cpp file when checking PR
